ygData.subject: About those scenarios
ygData.msgSnippet: Those scenarios I just uploaded under the file Torture.zip are NOT to played, but are only there in response to someone asking about what scenarios I have

From: "Daniel Paul Hightower" <dph_of_rules@...>

Those scenarios I just uploaded under the file 'Torture.zip' are NOT 
to played, but are only there in response to someone asking about what 
scenarios I have NOT published.  Those scenarios were designed for my 
PERSONAL use, with no intention of publishing them.  I do NOT expect 
to work on new scenarios until my new PC arrives.

Once and for all, where in heck is G:BF demo?  I will try to download 
it once my new PC comes in.  If anyone has it downloaded and in a zip 
format, I do have a valid email address that can receive it as an 
attachment.
